item.title: Going Deeper in Batch Normalization
item.description: This article will thoroughly explain batch normalization in a simple way. I wrote this article after getting failed an interview because of detailed batchnorm related question. I will start with why we need it, how it works, then how to fuse it into conv layer, and finally how to implement it in tensorflow. Here is the original paper about batch normalization on Arxiv: Batch Normalization: Accelerating Deep Network Training by Reducing Internal Covariate Shift.
